Summary: Had three lights looked like nothing but lights
divs: Sighting DetailsThe UFO Hovered above The Home Depot and was about 100ft above it and soon flipped upside down and went east towards our airport it landed around 150ft from the airport we were is our car and we followed it because we were going that way and we couldent see it anymore after it landed.I thought it was kind of scary because I was about 200ft away from it when it landed. I thought it was a helicopter until it flipped upside down. I lost sight of it because it landed
